title: Does talking on a phone while it is charging for 1 minute cause brain damage, or am I exaggerating? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A No, it does not cause brain damage. There is very little evidence that talking on the phone at all causes brain damage. The phone communicates through radio waves. This sounds scary, but these waves are literally just a form of light. The only waves which are dangerous in large amount are x-rays.
